name: Doomsday, Bloody Doomsday
description:
This is a short game made during the Lame Jam #12. The theme was Judgment Day.

Basically, you're god and you need to kill all humans. You can throw them into lava by using meteorites, you can send an army of killer Jesus or simply crush them with your holy foot.

Some levels are just there for fun but most of them are puzzles.
